screen_desc: The screenshot shows the "For you" section of the Google Play Store, featuring casual games. The top game is "Wordscapes In Bloom," a word search game available offline with a 4.7-star rating. Below, there are recommended games like "Highrise: Viral." The screen also displays the search bar at the top and navigation tabs for different sections like "Games," "Apps," "Offers," and "Books."
action_think: The app is not visible on the current screen, so I need to open the app drawer or search for it in the Play Store.
action_result: The last action of clicking on the search bar with the text prompt "Search for apps & games" has redirected the user to the app store where they can search for and install the desired app. This action is a necessary step towards meeting the user's request to open and log into the "Paramount+ | Peak Streaming" app. However, the app is not visible in the current screenshot, which means that the user may need to scroll or search for it within the app store.
